meanings.sent1: Farmers use dimethoates to protect their crops from bugs.
meanings.sent2: The dimethoates sprayed on the plants helped get rid of the pests.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous insects tried to steal the dimethoates, thinking it was a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: The dimethoates acted like a shield, keeping the bugs away from the plants.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the dimethoates made it easy to spot on the leaves.
